laoazhang

An Open Web advocate and front-end engineer, who loves everything mobile, and writes about HTML5, CSS, JS, UX, tech events, gadgets, etc. She unintentionally got 15min of fame by creating The HTTP Status Cats. Also, the opinions expressed here are solely her own and do not express the views or opinions of my employer.

Twitter Facebook LinkedIn Instagram Github

Nostalgia (Stuff from 90′s)

The original Laoazhang! site started in 1996 and was devoted for total Mac desktop customization for girls. I have created varieties of cute little desktop icons, wallpapers, Kaleidoscope schemes, fonts etc. all available for download for free.

Download

If you would like to download them, they are still available at my server so go grab them!

As the time passed by, I stopped creating such goodies and GirlieMac! site has lost its meaningâ€¦ more time has passed, I found myself becoming a mobile web developer. So I took this opportunity when Apple has announced iPhone, and decided to revive this site with a new blog but kept the domain name.
